name: Donald C. MARRO, petitioner, v. CITIBANK, N.A.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Donald C. MARRO, petitioner,
v.
CITIBANK, N.A.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until May 4, 2018, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
casebody.head_matter:
Donald C. MARRO, petitioner,
v.
CITIBANK, N.A.
No. 17-7871.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 16, 2018.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until May 4, 2018, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
